description: force that makes a moving body follow a curved path
label: centripetal force
subclass_of: physical influence that tends to cause an object to change motion unless opposed by other forces
subclasses: physical influence that tends to cause an object to change motion unless opposed by other forces
has_parts: physical influence that tends to cause an object to change motion unless opposed by other forces
property of matter to resist changes of the state of motion and to attract other bodies
rate of change of the position of an object as a function of time, and the direction of that change
segment in a circle or sphere from its center to its perimeter or surface and its length
